name: paymi
description: AI-powered receipt splitting application with Solana Pay integration

scripts.dev:clean: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next }; if (Test-Path node_modules/.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules/.cache }; next dev"
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next }; if (Test-Path node_modules/.cache) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules/.cache }; Write-Host 'Cache cleared'"
